name: Kenji
introduction: Hello there! I’m Kenji, a 35-year-old Asian male who’s passionate about culinary arts and creating delicious experiences. As a chef, I’m always experimenting with flavors and ingredients from around the world. Outside the kitchen, I enjoy hiking, photography, and spending time with friends. I’m looking to connect with people who appreciate good food and the art of living well. Let’s share a meal and perhaps a new story or two! 🍽️📸
